verbs.description: < p > Even as [ARG0: he] [V: reached] [ARG1: a critical moment in his diplomatic efforts with North Korea] and celebrated the release of a prisoner from Venezuela , President Donald Trump spent much of Memorial Day weekend tweeting angrily from the White House about the media and the Russia investigation , continuing his strategy of trying to delegitimize the probe that has consumed him since his election.</p >

< p > Even as [ARG0: he] reached a critical moment in his diplomatic efforts with North Korea and [V: celebrated] [ARG1: the release of a prisoner from Venezuela] , President Donald Trump spent much of Memorial Day weekend tweeting angrily from the White House about the media and the Russia investigation , continuing his strategy of trying to delegitimize the probe that has consumed him since his election.</p >
